perturbation.original_text: Client will pay Excite its variable revenue share payments within thirty (30) days after the close of each month.
perturbation.changed_text: Client will pay Excite its variable revenue share payments within sixty (60) days after the close of each month.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in payment terms. The original text states payment is due within 30 days, while the modified text extends this to 60 days. This creates ambiguity regarding the actual payment deadline.

perturbation.original_text: All undisputed payments that have accrued prior to the termination or expiration of this Agreement will be payable in full within thirty (30) days thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: All undisputed payments that have accrued prior to the termination or expiration of this Agreement will be payable in full within fifteen (15) days thereof.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction in payment terms. The original text gives 30 days for payment after termination, while the changed text requires payment within just 15 days, causing potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Client will provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client within thirty (30) days following the end of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.changed_text: Client will provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client within ten (10) days following the end of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction regarding the timeframe for delivering User Data. Section 12(h) originally states 30 days, while the modification mandates delivery within 10 days. This creates uncertainty and potential breach if the client adheres to the original 30-day term.
